WhyChooseUs.whyChooseUsDescription: With a professional attitude, top-notch service, cutting-edge technologies, and transparent policies, we attract customers who value excellence. What sets us apart from competitors is our passion and dedication to the industry.

WhyChooseUs.mobileTradingDescription: We stay ahead of the curve, and our application allows you to trade and access your cabinet online. Not only is this convenient, but it also saves you time, which is a trader's most valuable resource.

WhyChooseUs.manyDepositMethodsDescription: Our company provides traders with a wide range of options for depositing and withdrawing money. Some of the most reliable and convenient ways include bank wire transfers, credit/debit cards, electronic payments, local payments, and SuperForex Money.
WhyChooseUs.educationDescription: To trade efficiently, acquiring the necessary theoretical knowledge is crucial. This can be the most challenging aspect of trading, as there are no universities dedicated to training traders. However, training in international currency market trading is vital for developing a trader's skills. Our company has successfully combined various forms of training and selected the best quality educational materials. We offer traders the following methods of teaching: seminars, webinars, educational literature, and distance courses.
WhyChooseUs.forexCopyDescription: Forex Copy is our exclusive service that allows you to transfer information about your deals to other traders' trading terminals. By copying deals on Forex, you open the same deals as the Master trader you choose to follow. Your funds remain in your account, so you retain full control, including the volume of traded lots when copying deals.
WhyChooseUs.bonusesAndContestsDescription: Our company provides various bonuses for all customers and regularly conducts advertising campaigns and contests for traders with cash prizes. Additionally, we have contests for demo accounts, allowing novice traders to test their skills in the Forex market without spending their own money.
WhyChooseUs.economicNewsAndAnalysisDescription: To achieve success in the Foreign Exchange market, high-quality and consistent analytics are essential. Our website offers a range of news and analytical materials related to Forex. The SuperForex analytical department conducts daily analyses of major financial instruments and publishes the latest financial news, forecasts, and reviews. This includes economic news, technical analysis, trading signals, and an economic calendar.
WhyChooseUs.marketUnderstanding: We hope this information will assist traders in gaining a better understanding of the market and making informed decisions.

In addition to our standard account, we offer no-spread accounts, swap-free (Islamic) accounts, micro accounts, and profi-STP accounts. For those who want to practice trading strategies without any risk, we also offer a free demo account.

Regulation.superForexRegulationDescription: SuperForex deeply values its customers and prioritizes providing verifiable information about our company to help you make informed decisions. We are committed to conducting all our activities with honesty and transparency, ensuring that you can trust us as your reliable trading partner.
Regulation.investorCompensationFundDescription: Superfin Corp proudly participates in the Investor Compensation Fund (ICF). The ICF provides compensation to investors who experience losses due to broker insolvency. As a member, we are committed to protecting our clients' investments and ensuring they receive compensation in such situations. The ICF covers claims up to €20,000 per client, and we take pride in offering this level of protection to our clients.
Regulation.provideServices: Provide services, in accordance with the requirements of International legislation regulating financial services.
Regulation.insuranceOfFunds: Insurance of the funds to guaranty payments for all of clients.
Regulation.liquidityProvidersDescription: At the core of SuperForex’s business model is our commitment to providing the most attractive trading conditions on the market. As a No Dealing Desk broker, we maintain excellent spreads on all major currency pairs by collaborating with numerous liquidity providers. These international institutions ensure our bid and ask prices are always current, guiding your trading with fairness and transparency.
Regulation.trademarkDescription: Please be aware that SuperForex is a registered trademark. Our name and logo are internationally protected by the Office for Harmonization of the Internal Market, with registration number 014199831. As such, only SuperForex and our certified official partners are authorized to use this brand identity and perform related duties on our behalf.

FundsSecurity.fundsSecurityDescription: SuperForex highly values the security of your funds. We understand the importance of safeguarding your money, which is why we have implemented a sophisticated, multi-layered funds security program to provide maximum protection. With these measures in place, you can trust that your investments are always safe with us.
FundsSecurity.segregatedFundsDescription: At SuperForex, we prioritize the security of your funds with a segregated funds policy. This ensures that your money is stored separately from company funds, guaranteeing that it is used exclusively for your transactions and not for SuperForex's activities. What does this mean for you? In the hypothetical event that SuperForex faces any misfortune, your money will remain safe and unaffected by SuperForex’s own finances. You will always have full access to your funds, ensuring maximum protection and peace of mind.
FundsSecurity.sslCertificateDescription: We employ an SSL certificate to safeguard all the data you enter on our website. SSL, or Secure Sockets Layer, is a protocol that ensures secure communication between you and our websites. It works by allowing your device to establish trust with our servers based on unique criteria. This enables our servers to identify when it is genuinely you sending information, or when someone else is attempting to cause harm by impersonating you or altering the data you send. SSL protects your data and your account, ensuring a secure and reliable experience.
FundsSecurity.accountVerificationDescription: To ensure the full protection of your account, we recommend completing our comprehensive verification process, which includes: Email Verification, ID Scan, Address Verification, Phone Number Verification. A combination of these methods must be used to ensure your account is fully protected. By completing this process, you can safeguard your account from potential threats and unauthorized access.
FundsSecurity.loginHistoryDescription: You can access a full log-in history in the Client’s Cabinet. This feature displays all IP addresses that have logged into your account, making it easier to spot any suspicious activity immediately. The system shows the IP, location, time, operating system, and browser used for each log-in, enabling you to identify any potential malicious attacks on your account. Additionally, we send email alerts if we detect any suspicious login attempts to keep you informed and protected. By staying vigilant and utilizing these tools, you can ensure your account remains secure.
FundsSecurity.deviceIDDescription: To further protect your account, you can limit the devices that have access to it. The Device ID functionality, located in the Clients Cabinet under Security, allows you to add your computers, tablets, or smartphones that you authorize to log into your account. Any device not on the list will be unable to log in, even if it has your login data. This added layer of security ensures that only your approved devices can access your account, giving you greater peace of mind.
FundsSecurity.allowedIPListDescription: You can further improve the protection of your account by creating a list of allowed IP addresses. This would restrict access to your account so that only to the IPS you approved could log in, fending off potential attacks on your account.
FundsSecurity.fundsSecurityConclusion: Another way to enhance the security of your account is by creating a list of allowed IP addresses. This feature restricts access to your account so that only the IP addresses you have approved can log in. By doing so, you can effectively prevent potential attacks on your account from unauthorized IP addresses. By utilizing these security measures, you can ensure that your account remains safe and secure.

IndicesTrading.growingMarketDescription: Equity markets are usually growing markets. Unlike Forex, which is a flatter market and trends are much less common. Stock indices usually grow slowly, but can fall quickly and sharply.
IndicesTrading.reliableTrendsDescription: Stock indices have trends that are easier to follow, compared to currencies, usually in any timeframe. If the indices grow, they can grow or fall throughout the session with almost no kickbacks.
IndicesTrading.seasonalityInTradeDescription: Stock indices have a pronounced seasonality. In some months they mostly grow, for example, in December (the so-called Christmas rally), while in others they usually fall, for example, in May or October.
IndicesTrading.technicalAnalysisReasonableDescription: Stock indices are very technical - and all technical analysis figures, candlesticks, levels, etc. apply to them.
IndicesTrading.difficultToManipulateDescription: Unlike currency markets, stock indices are much more difficult to manipulate. They consist of dozens of different stocks and it is virtually impossible to 'move' a whole index.
IndicesTrading.manyOthersAccordingToWishes: And many others according to your wishes.
IndicesTrading.openRealTradingAccountDescription: Completely fill out the registration form.

DepositAndWithdrawal.depositsAndWithdrawalsDescription1: Replenishing your SuperForex account or withdrawing your earned profits is designed to be easy, quick, and transparent. Currently, our clients can open accounts in USD, EUR, and GBP, and use these three currencies for deposits and withdrawals.
DepositAndWithdrawal.depositsAndWithdrawalsDescription2: Our standard account requires a minimum deposit of just $50, giving you the freedom to decide how much to deposit at any given time.
DepositAndWithdrawal.noAdditionalFees: SuperForex does not charge any additional fees on transactions with your account. To ensure you do not incur any other fees when making deposits and withdrawals, please contact your bank or the payment system you use to inquire about their policies, particularly regarding currency conversion operations.

PartnershipProgram.superForexPartnersRewarded: SuperForex partners are rewarded for bringing in new clients and partners, as well as for motivating clients to trade more actively. The primary type of partnership is known as an introducing broker (IB), and it earns three types of commission.
PartnershipProgram.payPartnerUpTo100: We pay a partner up to 10% of the brokerage commission from the spread. This is a unique offer among brokers.
PartnershipProgram.percentageDifferenceDepositsWithdrawals: A percentage of the difference between deposits and withdrawals of referrals.
PartnershipProgram.receiveCommission3To10: You will receive a commission of 3% to start, which can be increased up to 10% depending on your activity.
PartnershipProgram.partnersParticipateRewardProgram: All partners automatically participate in the reward program and will get an additional percentage of the total commissions from spread received by them on a monthly basis.
PartnershipProgram.clientBecomesPartner: If your client becomes a partner or you attract another partner with their own clients, this new partner is called a sub-introducing broker.
PartnershipProgram.subIbCommission: Sub-IB commission amounts to 0.1 pips from the trades of your sub-IB referrals, which is approximately $1 - $2 per trade.
PartnershipProgram.manyPartnersSubIbs: If you have many partners who want to become Sub-IBs, we offer a 5-level affiliate program. You will receive a percentage of referral transactions of each of the 5 levels.
PartnershipProgram.beingPartnerBeneficial: Being a partner is very beneficial. The clients may make a profit or lose their money, but the partner will always be in the black.
PartnershipProgram.clientWinsPartnerReceives: If the client wins, the partner receives above-mentioned 3 types of commission. And if the client loses, the partner also receives the same 3 types of commission.
PartnershipProgram.tirelessWorkExpandPartnerNetwork: In 2023, our tireless work to expand the partner network and increase the level of Forex knowledge in Africa was recognized with an international award. Due to the highest spread commission in the market and the implementation of a reward program, our affiliate program was named the best in Africa by Finance Derivative.
PartnershipProgram.reachNewLevelTopPartners: To reach a new level, top partners open an introducing office. The Company helps with the printing of promotional materials, advertising on social networks, and in some cases with an office rental.
PartnershipProgram.officeBecomesTrainingCenter: In most cases, the office becomes a training center where various seminars, training, etc. are held. Every year, thousands of students improve their skills in our training centers.
PartnershipProgram.trustedPersonBankingOperations: This is a specially trusted person who has the right on behalf of the company to perform banking operations for depositing and withdrawing funds. This offer will be relevant in places where there is no access to banks or payment systems.
PartnershipProgram.localDepositorsEarnAdditionalIncome: Local Depositors can earn additional income with the help of SF Money vouchers, as will be shown below. In addition, the Company can individually encourage Local Depositors by adding local transaction clients to their affiliate group.
PartnershipProgram.acceptFundsReplenishAccount: You accept funds from the client to replenish his account, for example, $100. Order an SF money voucher for $100 with a 7% discount, i.e. for $93, and replenish the client's account with $100. Your profit is $7.
PartnershipProgram.continuousActivityNetCashFlow: With continuous activity, the partner accumulates Net cash flow within a month and uses the discount for the whole next month in accordance with the table:
PartnershipProgram.exchangeVoucherLocalCurrency: Now you can exchange your voucher not only for dollars, but also for your local currency, if it is available in your country.
PartnershipProgram.registerStartSuccess: Register and start your way to success
PartnershipProgram.canapartner: Can a partner make money without Forex knowledge?
PartnershipProgram.succeed: To succeed, you need knowledge not so much in Forex as in Internet marketing, site management, as well as an audience in social networks. We also offer our free training course on Youtube, which will allow you to quickly fill in the gaps in Forex knowledge.
PartnershipProgram.howopen: How often is the commission credited to my partner account?
PartnershipProgram.ib: IB commission is credited to the partner account once the client closes the deal.
PartnershipProgram.howexacly: How exactly does the Company help partners?
PartnershipProgram.attheinitial: At the initial stage, you will receive a digital IB certificate for free, you can get personal layouts of business cards, leaflets, and other promotional products for free, as well as banners for promotion on social networks. The next step is to order a free affiliate site. Further investments of the Company, such as office rent, and financial assistance in holding events, are determined by the interests of the Company and the prospects for income in each case individually.
PartnershipProgram.iwantto: I want to organize a seminar, how can you help me with this?
PartnershipProgram.assoonas: As soon as you become an active partner who will attract at least 5-10 active clients with a total deposit of 1k USD, we will be ready to support you in organizing a seminar, advertising, attracting clients and helping with merchandising.
PartnershipProgram.howcani: How can I open a representative office of SuperForex in my city?
PartnershipProgram.register: Register a partner account in our company and start attracting clients. In the meantime, keep working on your own ideal business plan on opening a representative office in your city. As soon as you feel you are fully ready to present your model of development to us, please, contact your personal manager from the Partnership department. If you show solid results attracting new clients, you can also get an offer to open an office in your city from SuperForex representatives.
PartnershipProgram.affiliateWork: Being a Forex affiliate is straightforward. You don't need extensive knowledge of financial markets or trading experience. Your main task is to introduce SuperForex to potential clients and encourage them to register. Once they open accounts and start trading, you'll earn a commission, known as Forex affiliate earnings.
PartnershipProgram.partnershipTypes: SuperForex offers several partnership options, with the most common being the Forex Introducing Broker (IB). This basic and popular program involves recruiting new clients for SuperForex.

Data.upTo100BonusContent: Bonus on the deposits of the clients attracted: you can further stimulate your affiliates to trade more by doubling their deposits with this bonus.
Data.haveExperience: Have experience in the Forex sphere
Data.haveExperienceContent: Share your knowledge, trading tips, and benefits of financial trading - people will follow your lead.
Data.knowOtherPeople: Know other people who may be interested in trading and how to get their attention
Data.knowOtherPeopleContent: Whether you have a website or a lot of followers on your social media - this is where you can find your clients. The more people you attract, and the more active they are, the greater your forex affiliate earnings will be.
Data.willingToLearn: Are willing to learn about our company and advertise us to your associates
Data.willingToLearnContent: The reason why the SuperForex business partner program is so popular is that we as a company offer prime quality services and constantly improve our offers. As a partner, we will do everything we can to inform you about every sweet deal we offer that can help motivate your affiliate group of clients.
Data.transparentConditionsContent: Traders can withdraw the profit earned from trading with the bonus.
Data.doubleDepositContent: Clients can get the unique opportunity to double their deposits in the amount from $100 to $1000.
Data.allInstrumentsContent: Traders can use any trading instruments, including shares, futures, and cryptocurrencies along with this bonus.
Data.competitiveCommissionContent: We offer our partners the most competitive commission on the market - up to 75% on the spread.
Data.affiliateMarketingDescription: Affiliate marketing gives you the opportunity to earn a living by advertising the goods and services of a company. As a Forex affiliate with us, you will serve as a brand ambassador, someone to recommend our services to new potential clients and provide information about SuperForex to anyone who might be interested. In return, you will get Forex affiliate earnings, i.e. commission, from all the trades the people you brought to SuperForex make. In other words, you will make money from other people’s trading activity, without doing a thing yourself!
Data.earnMoneyOnline: Is there a way to earn money online with SuperForex?
Data.earnMoneyOnlineDescription: Absolutely. Besides using SuperForex’s services as a trader yourself, you can earn money via our partnership program. As a partner, you will market our services to other people, and we will reward you with an attractive commission in return.
Data.howItWorks: I’m still not clear on how everything works. What do I need to do?
Data.howItWorksDescription: Getting started is easy. Simply create a Partners Account and our personal managers will contact you. They will guide you through the process and remain at your disposal every time you have a question.
Data.partnersCommissionDescription: Partners Commission (also Affiliate Commission) is a percentage of the spread that is paid to the partner for each trade made by a customer attracted by the same partner.
Data.affiliateGroupDescription: All of the clients brought to SuperForex by the same partner form their affiliate group. If you are a partner and you have attracted five new clients to SuperForex, those five people are your affiliate group. You get Forex affiliate earnings from everyone in your affiliate group, as long as they are active.
Data.bonusAsPartner: Can I get a bonus as a partner?
Data.bonusAsPartnerDescription: Spread is the difference between the Bid and Ask price of a certain trading instrument. Spread is specified by the broker for each trading instrument and is calculated in pips. It could be fixed at a certain amount, or floating, in which case it varies at different times.
Data.superForexMarket: How long has SuperForex been on the market?
Data.superForexMarketDescription: We have been working since 2013, constantly developing year after year.
Data.regulatedBrokerDescription: Yes. You are totally safe since we are a licensed Forex broker regulated by the International Financial Services Commission
Data.goldenChallengeWinner: How will the winner of the Golden Challenge be determined?
Data.goldenChallengeWinnerDescription: The partner who receives the maximum amount of partner commission during the contest period will become the winner. We will give them a real bar of gold as a reward.
Data.commissionFromTradingAccount: Will I receive a commission from my trading account?
Data.commissionFromTradingAccountDescription: No. According to the Partnership Agreement, clause 5.5 the Partner shall not be entitled to receive affiliate commissions from their own accounts and those owned by their close relatives if the Partner is an individual, as well as from the private accounts of founders or accounts of their close relatives if the Partner is a legal entity.
Data.commissionFromNegativeDeals: If my clients don’t make a profit, will there be a commission from negative deals?
Data.commissionFromNegativeDealsDescription: Yes, the partner receives a commission regardless of the result of the client’s trades.
Data.whenReceiveCommission: When will I receive the commission?
Data.whenReceiveCommissionDescription: The commission is credited to the partner’s account as soon as the client closes the transaction.
Data.customerIdentification: How do you know that this customer is mine?
Data.customerIdentificationDescription: If the client is registered through the affiliate link, they automatically join your affiliate group.
Data.changeAffiliateCode: Can I change my affiliate code?
Data.changeAffiliateCodeDescription: Yes, you can come up with your own code in the Partners Cabinet.
Data.tradeOnPartnerAccount: Can I trade on a Partner’s account?
Data.tradeOnPartnerAccountDescription: Yes, you can, but for trading at the best conditions we recommend opening a trading account.
Data.bonusForPartner: Can I get a bonus as a partner?
Data.bonusForPartnerDescription: No. Bonuses are available only for trading accounts
Data.verifyPartnerAccount: Is it necessary to verify my partner’s account?
Data.verifyPartnerAccountDescription: No. Verification is optional, though we highly recommend it.
Data.transferBetweenAccounts: Can I make a transfer from a partner account to a client account?
Data.transferBetweenAccountsDescription: Yes. You need to send a request for a special account that allows you to make transfers from a partner account to a client account and vice versa
Data.partnerEarnings: How much will I receive as a partner?
Data.partnerEarningsDescription: It all depends on your activity. Active partners earn an average of $1500-2000 per month.
Data.profitableAccountType: Which type of account is the most profitable?
Data.profitableAccountTypeDescription: You will receive a commission from all types of accounts.
Data.withdrawCommission: How often can I withdraw my commission?
Data.withdrawCommissionDescription: You can withdraw your commission at any time and in any amount.
Data.readyWebsite: How can I get a ready website?
Data.readyWebsiteDescription: You need to purchase a domain from any provider and fill out this request form.
Data.tradeOnClientsAccounts: Can I trade on my clients' accounts as an account manager?
Data.tradeOnClientsAccountsDescription: No, you can’t trade on your clients’ accounts. However, you can register as a Forex Master in the Forex Copy service, have your clients follow you, and then they will automatically copy your transactions.
Data.attractOtherPartnersDescription: Yes, you will receive an additional fee of 0.1 pip from each transaction of the client which was attracted by a partner from your affiliate group.
Data.canPartnerMakeMoneyWithoutForexKnowledge: Can a partner make money without Forex knowledge?

To succeed, you need knowledge not so much in Forex as in Internet marketing, site management, as well as an audience in social networks. We also offer our free training course on Youtube, which will allow you to quickly fill in the gaps in Forex knowledge.
